description: The Udyogini Scheme in Karnataka provides subsidies on loans for women to undertake business activities or micro-enterprises, promoting entrepreneurship and economic empowerment.

benefits.loan_amount: Up to Rs. 3 Lakhs for business setup
benefits.subsidy: 30% subsidy on loan amount, up to Rs. 90,000

residency_criteria: Must be a resident of Karnataka
business_criteria: Proposed business must be viable and sustainable

eligible_activities: Setting up micro-enterprises in manufacturing, services, or retail
Purchase of equipment or raw materials

steps: Obtain the application form from the Karnataka State Womenâ€™s Development Corporation
Submit a detailed business plan with the application
Attach required documents, including Aadhaar and residency proof
Applications are reviewed by the corporation
Approved applicants receive loans and subsidies
application_process.note: Applicants must secure a bank loan to avail subsidy

special_notes: The subsidy is linked to bank loans
Priority is given to women from SC/ST or disabled categories
